title: Grand Opening: Gateway to the Yarra Valley Sebel Stay with Self-Guided Mystery Picnic & Daily Breakfast
description:
Lush rolling vineyards, bespoke distilleries and acclaimed paddock-to-fork restaurants are at your fingertips from The Sebel Melbourne Ringwood. Perfectly poised at the gateway to Victoria's renowned Yarra Valley - in the up-and-coming Ringwood region - boasting design-driven architecture, luxe amenities, stylish rooms and a European-inspired restaurant and bar, this luxurious base is the perfect launchpad for a gourmet escape.

In less than 30 minutes you’ll reach the historic vineyards, cellar doors and microbreweries of Coldstream and Yering, before reaching the hub of the Yarra Valley. From here, feel a world away as you follow trails through towering forests, compare cellar-door tasting notes at over 80 wineries, graze your way through the local culinary scene, treat yourself to a relaxing spa experience or indulge your love of chocolate in a beautiful countryside dairy factory. Stocking up at farm gates as you go, there’s simply no better way to discover a region where creativity, tradition and nature go hand-in-hand than at The Sebel Melbourne Ringwood.
